creator: geraldo.mecja@avaloq.com
text:
When I try to open big scripts (~25MB), Jmeter takes too much time to open them. In my HP Elite i7 Core, it takes more than 30m.

I have tried to change memory settings and use other computers, but the results are the same.

Half an hour is too much in a professional environment, this is something that must be improved.

Which version of JMeter?
Which version of Java?

Having said that, 25 MB is a huge script file; even if it loads quickly it is going to require large amounts of memory at run time. You need to look at how to reduce the script file size, e.g. by using external files to parameterise the samplers.
